Menu.description: Manage settings that improve and personalize your experience.

useFingerprint.description: Enable or disable the use of the fingerprint for authentication and confirmation requests.

safetyTips.title: Safety tips
safetyTips.description: You also can contribute to the security using this app.

untrustedDevice.title: Security alert
untrustedDevice.description: This screen appears if you use the app on an unauthorized device.

errorCatcher.title: Error screen
errorCatcher.description: Displays a friendly screen when an error occurs.

feedbackAndSharing.title: Feedback and sharing
feedbackAndSharing.description: Do you think we can improve something or do you want to share this application?

helpCenter.description: Get more information, contact us, or find answers to your questions.

aboutUs.title: About us
aboutUs.content: At $t(common:appName.full), we're more than just a company; we're a dedicated team of individuals working together to make a difference. Our journey began with a simple idea - to create something extraordinary that adds value to the world. That idea has since evolved into a mission that guides everything we do. We're driven by innovation, and our passion for it fuels our daily efforts. We're here to challenge the status quo and push boundaries, striving to make the impossible possible. With creativity at our core, we turn concepts into reality, crafting solutions that matter. Our commitment to excellence is unwavering. We take pride in our work, ensuring that every product and service we offer meets the highest standards. Our customers are at the heart of everything we do, and their satisfaction is our ultimate goal. We embrace diversity, knowing that the best ideas come from different perspectives. Our team is a blend of talents, each contributing a unique set of skills and experiences. Together, we're unstoppable. Join us on our journey as we continue to innovate, exceed expectations, and leave a lasting impact. Together, we can create a brighter future.

termsOfUse.title: Terms of use
termsOfUse.content:
These terms of use govern your use of this mobile app and any services provided by it. By using this mobile app, you accept these terms of use in full. If you disagree with any part of these terms of use, you must not use this mobile app. 
License to Use Website 
Unless otherwise stated, we or our licensors own the intellectual property rights in the mobile app and material on the mobile app. Subject to the license below, all these intellectual property rights are reserved. 
You may view, download for caching purposes only, and print pages from the mobile app for your own personal use, subject to the restrictions set out below and elsewhere in these terms of use. 
You must not: 
Republish material from this mobile app. Sell, rent or sub-license material from the mobile app. Show any material from the mobile app in public. Reproduce, duplicate, copy or otherwise exploit material on this mobile app for a commercial purpose. Edit or otherwise modify any material on the mobile app. Limitations of Liability 
The information on this mobile app is provided free-of-charge, and you acknowledge that it would be unreasonable to hold us liable in respect of this mobile app and the information on this mobile app. While we endeavor to ensure the information is correct, we do not warrant its completeness or accuracy; nor do we commit to ensuring that the mobile app remains available or that the material on the mobile app is kept up-to-date. 
To the maximum extent permitted by applicable law, we exclude all representations, warranties, of use (including, without limitation, the conditions implied by law of satisfactory quality, fitness for purpose, and the use of reasonable care and skill). 
Variation 
We may revise these terms of use from time to time. Please check this page regularly to ensure you are familiar with the current version. 
Entire Agreement 
These terms of use, together with our Privacy Policy, constitute the entire agreement between you and us in relation to your use of our mobile app and supersede all previous agreements in respect of your use of this mobile app. 
By using this mobile app, you accept these terms of use in full. If you disagree with any part of these terms of use, you must not use this mobile app.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy policy
privacyPolicy.description: Learn how we protect your information.
privacyPolicy.content:
At $t(common:appName.full), we take your privacy seriously. This privacy policy outlines how we collect, use, share, and protect your personal information. We encourage you to read this notice carefully to understand our practices. 
Information We Collect
We collect information that you provide directly to us. This includes personal information such as your name, contact information, and any other data you choose to share with us. We may also collect information automatically, such as your IP address, browser type, and device information. 
How We Use Your Information 
We use the information we collect for various purposes, including: 
Providing and maintaining our services. Personalizing your experience. Sending you important updates and notifications. Monitoring and analyzing usage patterns to improve our services. Complying with legal obligations and resolving disputes. Information Sharing 
We may share your personal information with: 
Service providers who help us deliver our services. Law enforcement or government agencies in response to a legal request. Third parties with your consent. We do not sell your personal information to third parties. 
Data Security 
We take data security seriously and employ industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure. 
Your Privacy Choices 
You have the right to: 
Access, correct, or delete your personal information. Object to or restrict the processing of your personal information. Withdraw your consent at any time if you have previously provided it. Children's Privacy Our services are not intended for children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect or maintain information from children. 
Changes to This Notice 
We may update this privacy policy to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. We will notify you of any material changes. 
Contact Us 
If you have any questions, concerns, or requests regarding your personal information or this privacy policy,
privacyPolicy.content2:
Effective Date: April 27, 1992
Thank you for entrusting us with your information. Your privacy is important to us, and we are committed to protecting it.

contactUs.description: Send us a message through one of the available options.

content.description: You can send us a message through the social network of your choice, send us an email or speak to one of our advisors.

faqs.title: FAQs
faqs.description: Find answers to your questions here. If not, contact us.

bugReporter.title: Report a bug
bugReporter.description: Did you find a bug or do you think we can improve something? Tell us, we love to improve.
bugReporter.founddBug: If you found a bug or something we can improve, send us your comments and help us improve.

validations.min: Description must have at least 3 characters.
validations.matches: Please enter only letters and numbers.
validations.required: Include a description of what happened.

attachMultimedia.name: Attach images or videos
attachMultimedia.required: Please include evidence to support the report.
